name: CoReCo
tagline: Comparative ReConstruction of genome-scale metabolic networks
body:
CoReCo is a computational method for reconstructing metabolic networks of multiple species from protein sequence and phylogenetic data.

The method is described in our PLOS Computational Biology paper [Comparative Genome-Scale Reconstruction of Gapless Metabolic Networks for Present and Ancestral Species](http://www.ploscompbiol.org/article/info%3Adoi%2F10.1371%2Fjournal.pcbi.1003465).

![CoReCo word cloud](http://www.cs.helsinki.fi/u/epitkane/coreco.jpg)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
